page.title: 10THE MALL
page.content: {The Mall}is an undercover shopping centre spanning the River Irvine.There are 52 shops ,most common being shoe shops (5),and electrical goods (5). There are 5 independent shops and the rest are chain stores. {Interview results. Housewives said that they liked the idea of a centre because the children had some freedom of movement.However one shopworker objected to the cramped conditions and the heat.Young people wanted a sports shop and a hairdressers.Old folk liked the Mall but a few said that the ramps were too steep and wanted a lift.The Mall is open at night but Security Guards are kept busy to prevent vandalism. {MOST POPULAR SHOP}was a national food store. Everyone liked the brightness and comfort.
